page.title: 20A day in the life of....
page.content: Emma Kolowoski, I usually wake up at 6:30am, I get dressed and washed and go downstairs. I make myself a{cereal breakfast. At{8:30am}my sister and I leave for school, we catch a{bus}into Buckingham the journey taking about ten minutes. The{bell}at the beginning of school goes at 9:00am. English is the first lesson.At 10:25 we take a {break.}The next lesson is general History which is followed by Arithmetic. {Lunch break}is at{11:55am until 1:15pm. The next lesson is science,then one more{break at 2:20pm. The last lesson is Geography. We catch a bus home. At home if it is fine I go outside and practise {gymnastics}on the lawn or play with our lamb. I watch television until 9:00 when I go to{bed.
